fullText: Jim Parsons is perfectly cast as Elwood P. Dowd, the gentle drunk whose best friend is a six-foot-tall invisible rabbit. His performance is both sweet and deeply felt, never condescending to the material.

rejectionReasoning: openai: The text is a brief evaluation of Jim Parsons' performance without a broader assessment of the show.; kimi: This review discusses Jim Parsons in 'Harvey,' referring to the 2012 Broadway revival at the Roundabout Theatre rather than a current Broadway production.
